scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev npx webpack serve --config webpack.config.js
scripts.dev:prod: NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=prod node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=prod npx webpack serve --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=dev node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=dev npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=prod node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=prod npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
